<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:find="http://www.taleo.com/ws/tee800/2009/01/find" xmlns:quer="http://itk.taleo.com/ws/query">
    <soapenv:Header></soapenv:Header>
      <soapenv:Body>
        <find:findPartialEntities>
            <find:mappingVersion>http://www.taleo.com/ws/tee800/2009/01</find:mappingVersion>
            <find:query>
                <quer:query alias="EmailCheck" projectedClass="Candidate">
                    <quer:projections>
                        
                        <!-- Email Address -->
                        <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="EmailAddress"></quer:field>
                          </quer:projection>
                  
                          <!--Employee Details -->
                          <quer:projection>
                             <quer:field path="FirstName"></quer:field>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                             <quer:field path="LastName"></quer:field>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="SocialSecurityNumber"/>
                          </quer:projection>
                           <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="Address"/>
                            </quer:projection>
                             <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="Address2"/>
                             </quer:projection>
                            <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="City"/>
                            </quer:projection>
                             <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="ResidenceLocation,StateLocation,Abbreviation"/>
                             </quer:projection>
                            <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="ResidenceLocation,CountryLocation,ISO3166Alpha3"/>
                            </quer:projection>
                            <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="ZipCode"/>
                             </quer:projection>
                           <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="HomePhone"/>
                             </quer:projection>

                        <!-- Work IDs -->
                          <quer:projection>
                             <quer:field path="Number"></quer:field>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                             <quer:field path="EmployeeNumber"></quer:field>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                             <quer:field path="InternalApplication"></quer:field>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                             <quer:field path="Credentials,SSOID"></quer:field>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                             <quer:field path="Credentials,Username"></quer:field>
                          </quer:projection>
                  
                        <!-- Hire and Organization details -->
                           <quer:projection alias="HireType">
                               <quer:field path="Applications,Offers,JobseekerType,Description"/>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                              <quer:field path="Applications,Requisition,ContestNumber"/>
                         </quer:projection>
                         <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="Applications,Requisition,JobInformation,Company,Code"/>
                            </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                               <quer:field path="Applications,Requisition,JobInformation,Dept2,Code"/>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="Applications,Requisition,JobInformation,JobType,Number"/>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="Applications,Requisition,JobInformation,Group,Code"/>
                          </quer:projection>
                        <quer:projection>
                            <quer:field path="Applications,Requisition,JobInformation,Group,Description"/>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                               <quer:field path="Applications,Requisition,HiringManager,EmployeeID"/>
                          </quer:projection>
                          <quer:projection>
                               <quer:field path="Applications,Requisition,BaseJobTemplate,JobCode"/>
                          </quer:projection>
                          
                    </quer:projections>
               
                       <quer:projectionFilterings></quer:projectionFilterings>
               
                       <quer:filterings>
                        <quer:filtering>
                            <quer:likeIgnoreCase>
                                <quer:field path="Number"></quer:field>
                                <quer:string>438718</quer:string>
                             </quer:likeIgnoreCase>
                          </quer:filtering>
                       </quer:filterings>
                   </quer:query>
            </find:query>
            <find:attributes></find:attributes>
        </find:findPartialEntities>
    </soapenv:Body>
